mapper.sql: id, cid, hash, timestamp, fromaddr, toaddr, valuecoin, gasused, status, tarhash, createtime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from usdt_recharge_log
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into usdt_recharge_log (cid, hash, timestamp, fromaddr, toaddr, valuecoin, gasused, status, tarhash, createtime) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valuecoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into usdt_recharge_log
cid,
hash,
timestamp,
fromaddr,
toaddr,
valuecoin,
gasused,
status,
tarhash,
createtime,

mapper.update:
update usdt_recharge_log
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hash = #{record.hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timestamp = #{record.timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fromaddr = #{record.fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toaddr = #{record.toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valuecoin = #{record.valuecoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gasused = #{record.gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tarhash = #{record.tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update usdt_recharge_log set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hash = #{record.hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timestamp = #{record.timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fromaddr = #{record.fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toaddr = #{record.toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valuecoin = #{record.valuecoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gasused = #{record.gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tarhash = #{record.tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update usdt_recharge_log
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hash = #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fromaddr = #{fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toaddr = #{toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valuecoin = #{valuecoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gasused = #{gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tarhash = #{tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update usdt_recharge_log set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hash = #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fromaddr = #{fromaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toaddr = #{toaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valuecoin = #{valuecoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gasused = #{gasused,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tarhash = #{tarhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from ( select a.toaddr,ifnull(sum(a.valuecoin),0) as coin from usdt_recharge_log a where a.status=-1 and a.id!=-1 and a.valuecoin>=5 group by a.toaddr) t order by t.coin desc

select ifnull(sum(a.valuecoin),0) as coin from usdt_recharge_log a left join c_wallet b on a.toaddr=b.addr and b.type='USDT' where a.status=-1 and a.id!=-1 and a.valuecoin>=5 and b.nodeid=#{nodeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ifnull(sum(valuecoin),0) from usdt_recharge_log where valuecoin>=5 and status=-1
select ifnull(sum(valuecoin),0) from usdt_recharge_log where valuecoin>=5
